def chaotic_mirror(x: str) -> str:
    # Chaos fractal: reverse, randomly jumble characters, then mirror halfway parts
    mid = len(x) // 2
    first_half = list(x[:mid])
    second_half = list(x[mid:])
    random.shuffle(first_half)
    random.shuffle(second_half)
    return ''.join(first_half) + ''.join(second_half[::-1]) + x[::-1]
